product_name: Burton Tabloid Insulated Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A celebrity on the mountain, the Burton Tabloid jacket delivers warm and waterproof all-mountain performance and an array of Oscar-worthy features. Two-layer coated nylon shell with taped critical seams provides waterproof, breathable protection from the elements. Lightweight 3M(TM) Thinsulate(TM) (100g in body, 60g in sleeves) directs warmth to key areas through body-mapping insulation. Polyester taffeta lining slides on easily over layers, keeps warmth inside and wicks away moisture. Mesh-lined pit zips dump excess heat and provide cooling airflow when needed. Plush collar and a contoured, adjustable hood fit the shape of your head, providing an all-weather defense without obstructing vision or limiting motion. Faux fur trim around collar is removable. Powder skirt blocks out cold air and snow entry, and detaches when you don't want it. Features ample space to stash essentials, including fleeced-lined handwarmer pockets, pass pocket, and goggles/media pocket. The Burton Tabloid jacket features a contoured waist and slim details for a tailored look. Closeout.
short_description: A celebrity on the mountain, the Burton Tabloid jacket delivers warm and waterproof all-mountain performance and an array of Oscar-worthy features.
